title: The numbers are old-style, quite similar to Hoefler Text. I found it on a slideshow.
author: anita22

comments.content:
Sabon small caps, old style figures, and italic:  
 [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/sabon/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317153156/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/sabon/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/sabon/")
Oh God! There it is! Thank you very much!
